name: Defenseless (cocosar07)
description:
Short game made for Ludum Dare 46. The theme was "Keep it alive".

Try to keep your friend alive by putting yourself between them and the enemies.

Controls:

  • WASD/ZQSD/Arrow keys: move
  • Other keys are shown in game.

Softwares:

  • Godot Engine
  • Inkscape
